Hello blank fragment s Map
Welcome to Selera Sedap! \n\nA great and healthy family restaurant for dinner, a spot of lunch, or a place to hang–out with your friends. We are renowned for our authentic cuisine and unparalleled service. Our lunch and dinner menus boast traditional and unique dishes prepared fresh daily by our seasoned chef with recipes of over 40 years. \n\nOur passion lies in healthy food and simplicity – great seasonal ingredients from local suppliers, cooked with care and NO MSG and presented with flair. \n\nWith a long history of recipe (since 1960) that has been passed on to the third generation and with our background in fine dining, our aim is to achieve balanced and appealing dishes, without pretentiousness and most importantly that is cost–efficient for everybody. \n\nWe cook all of our food with NO MSG!! We want to encourage people to live healthy. Good food doesn’t always mean unhealthy food. \n\nOur guarantee is that you have full stomach without the need to break your pocket. \n\nBook a party today and invite your friends and family out to celebrate birthdays, arisan, graduations, anniversaries and more with no extra charge for our facilities. \n\nPlease allow 15–20 minutes for all takeout orders, and we encourage reservations for parties of eight or more. Selera Sedap is the first Indoriental Restaurant in Cirebon that cooks all of its dishes with NO MSG. \n\nOur cuisine brings together many South East Asian flavors, including Indonesian, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Vietnamese and Thai elements. \n\nThe secret recipes have been passed down to the third generation with over 40 years of history. \n\nWith over 50 unique dishes created for you by top ranked chefs, Selera Sedap offers a unique dining experience that will forever transform your perception of Indoriental cuisine. \n\nSelera Sedap features a simple yet modern décor, making it a perfect restaurant for any occasion. \n\nThe outstanding service the diners receive at Selera Sedap comes from the heart; everyone at Selera Sedap seeks to put the guest’s needs first, providing proactive service in which even the tiniest detail embodies Selera Sedap’s service philosophy and brand values. \n\nCome to experience a whole new taste in Indoriental cuisine at Selera Sedap! Special event catering from our kitchen to your table. \n\n We Make Your Occasion A Special Occasion . . . - Design your meal around a theme or special occasion. \n - Plan your menu with us. \n - Select one of our Menus or custom design your own special menu to fit your occasion and budget.
